title: Create Assignments
description: Easily create assignments for your study group, set deadlines, and specify the difficulty level to manage workload effectively.

title: Submit & Review
description: Submit your assignments for peer review and provide constructive feedback to your friends, helping each other grow.

title: Group Collaboration
description: Collaborate with your study group, discuss assignments, and share resources to improve your learning experience together.

title: Track Progress
description: Track the status of your assignments and see which ones are completed, pending, or in review, all in one place.

title: Real-Time Notifications
description: Get notified about assignment deadlines, new submissions, and reviews to stay on top of your tasks and deadlines.

title: Mark Assignments
description: Evaluate your peers' assignments, provide feedback, and assign marks based on the quality of their submissions.
